trans-unit.source: “e.g.” and “i.e.”: Go ahead and use “e.g.” or “i.e.” instead of spelling them out. Don’t worry about putting a comma after them.
trans-unit.target: “例如”和“即”：继续并使用“例如”或“即”而不是将其拼写出来。不必担心在逗号后加逗号。

trans-unit.source: “e.g.” means “for example”; “i.e.” means “that is”
trans-unit.target: “例如”是指“例如”；“ ie”的意思是“就是”

trans-unit.source: “macOS” for all versions, “OS X” or “Mac OS X” when describing specific older versions
trans-unit.target: 所有版本均为“ macOS”，描述特定的较早版本时为“ OS X”或“ Mac OS X”

trans-unit.source: “pull request”, not “Pull Request”
trans-unit.target: “拉动请求”，而不是“拉动请求”

trans-unit.source: “repository”, not “repo”

trans-unit.source: Features, dependencies and installation instructions are described below. Terminology (e.g. the difference between a Cellar, Tap, Cask and so forth) is explained in the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 功能，依赖项和安装说明如下所述。文档中解释了术语（例如，地窖，水龙头，木桶等之间的区别）。

trans-unit.source: Make a separate commit for each changed formula with git add and git commit.
trans-unit.target: 使用 git add 和 git commit 为每个更改的公式进行单独的提交。

trans-unit.source: language-homebrew-formula adds highlighting and diff support (with the language-diff plugin).
trans-unit.target: language-homebrew-formula添加了突出显示和diff支持（使用language-diff插件）。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew on Linux category of Homebrew’s Discourse
trans-unit.target: Linux上的Homebrew 类Homebrew话语

trans-unit.source: formulae.brew.sh has a documented JSON API which provides access to the brew info --json=v1 output without needing access to Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: Formulae.brew.sh具有记录在案的JSON API，该API提供对 brew info --json=v1 输出的访问，而无需访问Homebrew。

trans-unit.source: Fork the Homebrew/brew repository on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 在GitHub上分叉Homebrew / brew存储库。

trans-unit.source: jrnl is an example of a formula that does this well. The end result means the user doesn’t have to use pip or Python and can just run jrnl.
trans-unit.target: jrnl 是一个很好地执行此公式的示例。最终结果意味着用户不必使用 pip 或Python，只需运行 jrnl 即可。

trans-unit.source: pdftohtml provides an example of a serious conflict, where both formula ship an identically-named binary that is essential to functionality, so a conflicts_with is preferable.
trans-unit.target: pdftohtml 提供了一个严重的冲突，其中两个式运送的相同名称的二进制也就是功能性必需的，因此一个的示例 conflicts_with 是优选的。

trans-unit.source: Fork the Homebrew/homebrew-core repository on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 在GitHub上分叉Homebrew / homebrew-core存储库。

trans-unit.source: InstantClientTap/instantclient: A tap for Oracle Instant Client. The packages need to be downloaded manually.
trans-unit.target: InstantClientTap / instantclient：单击Oracle Instant Client。软件包需要手动下载。

trans-unit.source: brewsci/bio: Bioinformatics formulae.
trans-unit.target: brewsci / bio：生物信息学公式。

trans-unit.source: davidchall/hep: High energy physics formulae.
trans-unit.target: davidchall / hep：高能物理公式。

trans-unit.source: denji/nginx: A tap for NGINX modules, intended for its nginx-full formula which includes more module options.
trans-unit.target: denji / nginx：用于NGINX模块的水龙头，用于其 nginx-full 公式，其中包括更多模块选项。

trans-unit.source: dunn/emacs: A tap for Emacs packages.
trans-unit.target: dunn / emacs：Emacs软件包的水龙头。

trans-unit.source: homebrew-mode provides syntax highlighting for inline patches as well as a number of helper functions for editing formula files.
trans-unit.target: homebrew-mode为内联修补程序提供语法高亮显示，并提供许多用于编辑公式文件的辅助函数。

trans-unit.source: pcmpl-homebrew provides completion for emacs shell-mode and eshell-mode.
trans-unit.target: pcmpl-homebrew为emacs外壳模式和eshell-mode提供完成。

trans-unit.source: lifepillar/appleii: Formulae for vintage Apple emulation.
trans-unit.target: lifepillar / appleii：老式Apple仿真的公式。

trans-unit.source: mistydemeo/tigerbrew: Experimental Tiger PowerPC version.
trans-unit.target: mistydemeo / tigerbrew：Tiger PowerPC实验版本。

trans-unit.source: osrf/simulation: Tools for robotics simulation.
trans-unit.target: osrf / simulation：机器人仿真工具。

trans-unit.source: osx-cross/avr: GNU AVR toolchain (Libc, compilers and other tools for Atmel MCUs, useful for Arduino hackers and AVR programmers).
trans-unit.target: osx-cross / avr：GNU AVR工具链（Libc，Atmel MCU的编译器和其他工具，对Arduino黑客和AVR程序员有用）。

trans-unit.source: petere/postgresql: Allows installing multiple PostgreSQL versions in parallel.
trans-unit.target: petere / postgresql：允许并行安装多个PostgreSQL版本。

trans-unit.source: RISC-V provides the RISC-V toolchain including binutils and GCC.
trans-unit.target: RISC-V提供了RISC-V工具链，包括binutils和GCC。

trans-unit.source: sidaf/pentest: Tools for penetration testing.
trans-unit.target: sidaf / pentest：渗透测试工具。

trans-unit.source: homebrew-pypi-poet can help you generate resource stanzas for the dependencies of your Python application.
trans-unit.target: homebrew-pypi-poet可以帮助您为Python应用程序的依赖项生成 resource 节。

trans-unit.source: titanous/gnuradio: GNU Radio and friends running on macOS.
trans-unit.target: titanous / gnuradio：GNU Radio和在macOS上运行的朋友。

trans-unit.source: varenc/ffmpeg: A tap for FFmpeg with additional options, including nonfree additions.
trans-unit.target: varenc / ffmpeg：FFmpeg的水龙头，带有其他选项，包括非免费添加。

trans-unit.source: brew.vim adds highlighting to inline patches in Vim.
trans-unit.target: brew.vim为Vim中的内联补丁添加了突出显示。

trans-unit.source: PEP 453 makes a recommendation to downstream distributors (us) that sdist tarballs should be installed with pip instead of by invoking setup.py directly. We do not do this because Apple’s Python distribution does not include pip, so we can’t assume that pip is available. We could do something clever to work around Apple’s piplessness but the value proposition is not yet clear.
trans-unit.target: PEP 453向下游发行商（美国）建议，应该使用 pip 安装sdist tarball，而不是直接调用 setup.py 。我们不这样做是因为Apple的Python发行版不包含pip，因此我们不能假定pip可用。我们可以做一些聪明的事情来解决苹果的无网点问题，但价值主张尚不明确。

trans-unit.source: fails_with declarations can be used with any of :gcc, :llvm, and :clang. Homebrew will use this information to select a working compiler (if one is available).
trans-unit.target: fails_with 声明可以与 :gcc ， :llvm 和 :clang 中的任何一个一起使用。Homebrew将使用此信息来选择可以运行的编译器（如果可用）。

trans-unit.source: head URLs (activated by passing --HEAD) build the development cutting edge. Specifying it is easy:
trans-unit.target: head URL（通过传递 --HEAD 激活）构建了开发的前沿。指定起来很容易：

trans-unit.source: option names should be prefixed with the words with or without. For example, an option to run a test suite should be named --with-test or --with-check rather than --test, and an option to enable a shared library --with-shared rather than --shared or --enable-shared.
trans-unit.target: option 名称应 with 或 without 带有单词的前缀。例如，运行测试套件的选项应命名为 --with-test 或 --with-check 而不是 --test ，而启用共享库的选项应命名为 --with-shared 而不是 --shared 或 --enable-shared 。

trans-unit.source: options that aren’t build.with? or build.without? should be deprecated with deprecated_option. See wget for an example.
trans-unit.target: option 不是 build.with? 选项 s？或 build.without? 应该使用 deprecated_option 弃用。有关示例，请参见 wget 。

trans-unit.source: patches can be declared in stable, devel, and head blocks. Always use a block instead of a conditional, i.e. stable do ... end instead of if build.stable? then ... end.
trans-unit.target: patch es可以在 stable ， devel 和 head 块中声明。始终使用块而不是有条件的（即 stable do ... end 而不是 if build.stable? then ... end 。

trans-unit.source: plist_name will return e.g. homebrew.mxcl.<formula>
trans-unit.target: plist_name 将返回例如 homebrew.mxcl.<formula>

trans-unit.source: plist_path will return e.g. /usr/local/Cellar/foo/0.1/homebrew.mxcl.foo.plist
trans-unit.target: plist_path 将返回例如 /usr/local/Cellar/foo/0.1/homebrew.mxcl.foo.plist

trans-unit.source: revisions are also used for formulae that move from the system OpenSSL to the Homebrew-shipped OpenSSL without any other changes to that formula. This ensures users aren’t left exposed to the potential security issues of the outdated OpenSSL. An example of this can be seen in this commit.
trans-unit.target: revision s也用于从系统OpenSSL迁移到自家发行的OpenSSL的公式，而对该公式没有任何其他更改。这样可以确保用户不会暴露于过时的OpenSSL的潜在安全问题。在此commit中可以看到一个示例。

trans-unit.source: inreplace is a convenience function that can edit files in-place. For example:
trans-unit.target: inreplace 是一种便利功能，可以就地编辑文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: inreplace should be used instead of patches when patching something that will never be accepted upstream, e.g. making the software’s build system respect Homebrew’s installation hierarchy. If it’s something that affects both Homebrew and MacPorts (i.e. macOS specific) it should be turned into an upstream submitted patch instead.
trans-unit.target: inreplace 在修补上游永远不会接受的内容时，应使用 inreplace而不是修补程序，例如，使软件的构建系统遵守Homebrew的安装层次结构。如果它同时影响Homebrew和MacPorts（即特定于macOS），则应将其转换为上游提交的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv ships pip and creates isolated Python environments with separate site-packages, therefore you won’t need sudo.
trans-unit.target: Virtualenv提供 pip 并使用单独的站点包创建隔离的Python环境，因此您不需要sudo。

trans-unit.source: Taps are external sources of Homebrew formulae and/or external commands. They can be created by anyone to provide their own formulae and/or external commands to any Homebrew user.
trans-unit.target: Tap是Homebrew公式和/或外部命令的外部来源。任何人都可以创建它们，以向任何Homebrew用户提供自己的公式和/或外部命令。

trans-unit.source: 1 For 32-bit or PPC support see Tigerbrew.
trans-unit.target: 1对于32位或PPC支持，请参见 Tigerbrew。

trans-unit.source: 2 10.12 or higher is recommended. 10.9–10.11 are supported on a best-effort basis. For 10.4-10.6 see Tigerbrew.
trans-unit.target: 2建议使用10.12或更高版本。尽力支持10.9–10.11。对于10.4-10.6，请参见 Tigerbrew。

trans-unit.source: 3 Most formulae require a compiler. A handful require a full Xcode installation. You can install Xcode, the CLT, or both; Homebrew supports all three configurations. Downloading Xcode may require an Apple Developer account on older versions of Mac OS X. Sign up for free here.
trans-unit.target: 3大多数公式需要编译器。少数需要完整的Xcode安装。您可以安装Xcode和/或CLT；Homebrew支持所有三种配置。下载Xcode可能需要在较旧版本的Mac OS X上使用Apple Developer帐户。在此处免费注册。

trans-unit.source: 4 The one-liner installation method found on brew.sh requires a Bourne-compatible shell (e.g. bash or zsh). Notably, fish, tcsh and csh will not work.
trans-unit.target: 4 brew.sh上的单行安装方法需要兼容Bourne的外壳（例如bash或zsh）。值得注意的是，fish，tcsh和csh将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: <YOUR_USERNAME> is your GitHub username, not your local machine username.
trans-unit.target: <YOUR_USERNAME> 是您的GitHub用户名，而不是您的本地计算机用户名。

trans-unit.source: --1: Only show dependencies one level down, instead of recursing.
trans-unit.target: --1 ：仅向下一级显示依赖项，而不递归。

trans-unit.source: --HEAD: Fetch HEAD version instead of stable version.
trans-unit.target: --HEAD ：获取HEAD版本而不是稳定版本。

trans-unit.source: --HEAD: If formula defines it, install the HEAD version, aka. master, trunk, unstable.
trans-unit.target: --HEAD ：如果 formula 定义了它，则安装HEAD版本。主人，树干，不稳定。

trans-unit.source: --HEAD: Indicate that URL points to the package’s repository rather than a file.
trans-unit.target: --HEAD ：指示 URL 指向软件包的存储库而不是文件。

trans-unit.source: --HEAD: Show usage of formula by HEAD build.
trans-unit.target: --HEAD ：按HEAD版本显示 formula 的用法。

trans-unit.source: --HEAD: Test the head version of a formula.
trans-unit.target: --HEAD ：测试公式的标头版本。

trans-unit.source: --aliases: Verify any alias symlinks in each tap.
trans-unit.target: --aliases ：验证每次点击中的任何别名符号链接。

trans-unit.source: --all: List dependencies for all available formulae.
trans-unit.target: --all ：列出所有可用公式的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: --all: Print JSON of all available formulae.
trans-unit.target: --all ：打印所有可用公式的JSON。

trans-unit.source: --all: Show options for all formulae.
trans-unit.target: --all ：显示所有公式的选项。

trans-unit.source: --analytics: Display global Homebrew analytics data or, if specified, installation and build error data for formula (provided neither HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS nor HOMEBREW_NO_GITHUB_API are set).
trans-unit.target: --analytics ：显示全局Homebrew分析数据，或者，如果指定，则显示 formula 安装和构建错误数据（前提是未设置 HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS 或 HOMEBREW_NO_GITHUB_API ）。

trans-unit.source: --annotate: Mark any build, test, optional, or recommended dependencies as such in the output.
trans-unit.target: --annotate ：在输出中标记任何构建，测试，可选或建议的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: --autotools: Create a basic template for an Autotools-style build.
trans-unit.target: --autotools ：为Autotools样式的构建创建基本模板。

trans-unit.source: --before: Use the commit at provided date as the start commit.
trans-unit.target: --before ：使用提供的 date 处的提交作为开始提交。

trans-unit.source: --bintray-org: Publish bottles at the provided Bintray organisation.
trans-unit.target: --bintray-org ：在提供的Bintray organisation 发布瓶子。

trans-unit.source: --bottle-arch: Optimise bottles for the given architecture rather than the oldest architecture supported by the version of macOS the bottles are built on.
trans-unit.target: --bottle-arch ：针对给定的体系结构优化瓶子，而不是优化构建瓶子所基于的macOS版本所支持的最旧的体系结构。

trans-unit.source: --bottle: Handle bottles, pulling the bottle-update commit and publishing files on Bintray.
trans-unit.target: --bottle ：处理瓶子，拉动瓶子更新提交并在Bintray上发布文件。

trans-unit.source: --branch-okay: Do not warn if pulling to a branch besides master (useful for testing).
trans-unit.target: --branch-okay ：如果拉到master以外的分支（对测试有用），则不会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: --build-bottle: Download the source (for eventual bottling) rather than a bottle.
trans-unit.target: --build-bottle ：下载源文件（用于最终装瓶），而不是下载瓶子。

trans-unit.source: --build-bottle: Prepare the formula for eventual bottling during installation.
trans-unit.target: --build-bottle ：准备在安装过程中最终装瓶的公式。

trans-unit.source: --bump: For one-formula PRs, automatically reword commit message to our preferred format.
trans-unit.target: --bump ：对于单格式PR，自动将提交消息改写为我们首选的格式。

trans-unit.source: --cache [options] [formula]
trans-unit.target: --cache [ options ] [ formula ]

trans-unit.source: --cached: Print the cached linkage values stored in HOMEBREW_CACHE, set by a previous brew linkage run.
trans-unit.target: --cached ：打印存储在 HOMEBREW_CACHE 中的缓存的链接值，该值由先前的 brew linkage 运行设置。

trans-unit.source: --casks: Display all locally available casks (including tapped ones). No online search is performed.
trans-unit.target: --casks ：显示所有本地可用的酒桶（包括轻拍的酒桶）。不执行在线搜索。

trans-unit.source: --category: Which type of global analytics data to retrieve. The value for category must be install, install-on-request, cask-install, build-error or os-version. The default is install.
trans-unit.target: --category ：要检索的全局分析数据的类型。对于值 category 必须是 install ， install-on-request ， cask-install ， build-error 或 os-version 。默认值为 install 。

trans-unit.source: --cc: Attempt to compile using provided compiler. compiler should be the name of the compiler’s executable, for instance gcc-7 for GCC 7. In order to use LLVM’s clang, use llvm_clang. To specify the Apple-provided clang, use clang. This parameter will only accept compilers that are provided by Homebrew or bundled with macOS. Please do not file issues if you encounter errors while using this flag.
trans-unit.target: --cc ：尝试使用提供的 compiler 。 compiler 应该是编译器可执行文件的名称，例如GCC 7的 gcc-7 。为了使用LLVM的clang，请使用 llvm_clang 。要指定Apple提供的clang，请使用 clang 。此参数仅接受由Homebrew提供或与macOS捆绑在一起的编译器。如果在使用此标志时遇到错误，请不要提出问题。

trans-unit.source: --cellar [formula]
trans-unit.target: --cellar [ formula ]

trans-unit.source: --clean: Do not rewrite or otherwise modify the commits found in the pulled PR.
trans-unit.target: --clean ：请勿重写或修改在拉出的PR中找到的提交。

trans-unit.source: --cmake: Create a basic template for a CMake-style build.
trans-unit.target: --cmake ：为CMake样式的构建创建基本模板。

trans-unit.source: --commit: Use provided commit as the start commit.
trans-unit.target: --commit ：使用提供的 commit 作为开始提交。

trans-unit.source: --compact: Show all options on a single line separated by spaces.
trans-unit.target: --compact ：在所有由空格分隔的行上显示所有选项。

trans-unit.source: --coverage: Generate code coverage reports.
trans-unit.target: --coverage ：生成代码覆盖率报告。

trans-unit.source: --days: How many days of global analytics data to retrieve. The value for days must be 30, 90 or 365. The default is 30.
trans-unit.target: --days ：要检索多少天的全局分析数据。为值 days 必须是 30 ， 90 或 365 。默认值为 30 。

trans-unit.source: --debian: Search for text in the given package manager’s list.
trans-unit.target: --debian ：在给定的包管理器列表中搜索 text 。

trans-unit.source: --debug will ask you to open an interactive shell if the build fails so you can try to figure out what went wrong.
trans-unit.target: --debug 如果构建失败，-- debug会要求您打开一个交互式shell，以便您可以找出问题出在哪里。

trans-unit.source: --deps: Download dependencies for any listed formula.
trans-unit.target: --deps ：下载任何列出的 formula 依赖项。

trans-unit.source: --desc: search formulae with a description matching text and casks with a name matching text.
trans-unit.target: --desc ：搜索描述与 text 匹配的配方，以及名称与 text 匹配的桶。

trans-unit.source: --destdir: Create subdirectories in the directory named by path instead.
trans-unit.target: --destdir ：在由 path 命名的目录中创建子目录。

trans-unit.source: --devel: Bump the development rather than stable version. The development spec must already exist.
trans-unit.target: --devel ：颠簸开发而不是稳定版本。开发规范必须已经存在。

trans-unit.source: --devel: Fetch development version instead of stable version.
trans-unit.target: --devel ：获取开发版本而不是稳定版本。

trans-unit.source: --devel: If formula defines it, install the development version.
trans-unit.target: --devel ：如果 formula 定义了它，请安装开发版本。

trans-unit.source: --devel: Show usage of formula by development build.
trans-unit.target: --devel ：通过开发版本显示 formula 的用法。

trans-unit.source: --devel: Test the development version of a formula.
trans-unit.target: --devel ：测试公式的开发版本。

trans-unit.source: --display-cop-names: Include the RuboCop cop name for each violation in the output.
trans-unit.target: --display-cop-names ：在输出中包括每个违规的RuboCop cop名称。

trans-unit.source: --display-filename: Prefix every line of output with name of the file or formula being audited, to make output easy to grep.
trans-unit.target: --display-filename ：在输出的每一行前面都加上要审核的文件或公式的名称，以使输出易于grep。

trans-unit.source: --display-times: Print install times for each formula at the end of the run.
trans-unit.target: --display-times ：在运行结束时为每个公式打印安装时间。

trans-unit.source: --dry-run: Show what would be upgraded, but do not actually upgrade anything.
trans-unit.target: --dry-run ：显示要升级的内容，但实际上不升级任何内容。

trans-unit.source: --env [options]
trans-unit.target: --env [ options ]

trans-unit.source: --env: If std is passed, use the standard build environment instead of superenv.If super is passed, use superenv even if the formula specifies the standard build environment.
trans-unit.target: --env ：如果传递了 std ，则使用标准构建环境而不是superenv ;如果传递了 super ，则即使公式指定了标准构建环境，也应使用superenv。

trans-unit.source: --env: Use the standard PATH instead of superenv’s, when std is passed
trans-unit.target: --env ：在传递 std 时，使用标准 PATH 而不是superenv的

trans-unit.source: --examples: Show several examples.
trans-unit.target: --examples ：显示几个例子。

trans-unit.source: --except-cops: Specify a comma-separated cops list to skip checking for violations of the listed RuboCop cops.
trans-unit.target: --except-cops ：指定一个逗号分隔的 cops 列表，以跳过检查是否违反列出的RuboCop警察。

trans-unit.source: --except: Specify a comma-separated method list to skip running the methods named audit_method.
trans-unit.target: --except ：指定以逗号分隔的 method 列表，以跳过运行名为 audit_ method 的方法。

trans-unit.source: --fail-if-changed: Return a failing status code if changes are detected in the manpage outputs. This can be used for CI to be notified when the manpages are out of date. Additionally, the date used in new manpages will match those in the existing manpages (to allow comparison without factoring in the date).
trans-unit.target: --fail-if-changed ：如果在手册页输出中检测到更改，则返回失败的状态代码。当联机帮助页过期时，可以使用此通知CI。此外，新手册页中使用的日期将与现有手册页中的日期匹配（以便进行比较而不考虑日期）。

trans-unit.source: --fedora: Search for text in the given package manager’s list.
trans-unit.target: --fedora ：在给定的包管理器列表中搜索 text 。

trans-unit.source: --fetch-HEAD: Fetch the upstream repository to detect if the HEAD installation of the formula is outdated. Otherwise, the repository’s HEAD will be checked for updates when a new stable or development version has been released.
trans-unit.target: --fetch-HEAD ：获取上游存储库以检测公式的HEAD安装是否已过时。否则，在发布新的稳定版或开发版时，将检查存储库的HEAD是否更新。

trans-unit.source: --fink: Search for text in the given package manager’s list.
trans-unit.target: --fink ：在给定的包管理器列表中搜索 text 。

trans-unit.source: --fix: Fix style violations automatically using RuboCop’s auto-correct feature.
trans-unit.target: --fix ：使用RuboCop的自动更正功能自动修复样式冲突。

trans-unit.source: --for-each: Switch into the mode used by the --all option, but only list dependencies for the specified formula, one formula per line. This is used for debugging the --installed/--all display mode.
trans-unit.target: --for-each ：切换到 --all 选项使用的模式，但仅列出指定 formula 依赖关系，每行一个公式。这用于调试 --installed / --all 显示模式。

trans-unit.source: --force-auto-update: Auto-update tap even if it is not hosted on GitHub. By default, only taps hosted on GitHub are auto-updated (for performance reasons).
trans-unit.target: --force-auto-update ：即使没有托管在GitHub上，也可以自动更新它。默认情况下，仅托管在GitHub上的拍子会自动更新（出于性能原因）。

trans-unit.source: --force-bottle: Download a bottle if it exists for the current or newest version of macOS, even if it would not be used during installation.
trans-unit.target: --force-bottle ：即使当前或最新版本的macOS存在瓶子，也要下载它，即使在安装过程中不使用它。

trans-unit.source: --force-bottle: Install from a bottle if it exists for the current or newest version of macOS, even if it would not normally be used for installation.
trans-unit.target: --force-bottle ：如果当前或最新版本的macOS存在，则从瓶子安装，即使通常不用于安装。

trans-unit.source: --force-bottle: Show the cache file used when pouring a bottle.
trans-unit.target: --force-bottle ：显示倒入瓶子时使用的缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: --force-core-tap: Build a bottle even if formula is not in homebrew/core or any installed taps.
trans-unit.target: --force-core-tap ：即使 formula 不在 homebrew/core 或任何已安装的水龙头中，也要制造一个瓶子。

trans-unit.source: --full-name: List dependencies by their full name.
trans-unit.target: --full-name ：列出依赖项的全名。

trans-unit.source: --full-name: Print formulae with fully-qualified names. If --full-name is not passed, other options (i.e. -1, -l, -t and -r) are passed to ls which produces the actual output.
trans-unit.target: --full-name ：打印具有完全限定名称的公式。如果未传递 --full-name ，则将其他选项（即 -1 ， -l ， -t 和 -r ）传递给 ls ，从而产生实际输出。

trans-unit.source: --full: Use a full clone when tapping a repository. By default, the repository is cloned as a shallow copy (--depth=1). To convert a shallow copy to a full copy, you can retap passing --full without first untapping.
trans-unit.target: --full ：点击存储库时使用完整克隆。默认情况下，系统 --depth=1 存储库克隆为浅表副本（--depth = 1）。要将浅表副本转换为完整副本，您可以重新传递 --full ,而无需先打开它们。

trans-unit.source: --generic: Run only OS-agnostic tests.
trans-unit.target: --generic ：仅运行与操作系统无关的测试。

trans-unit.source: --github: Open a browser to the GitHub source page for formula. To view formula history locally: brew log -pformula
trans-unit.target: --github ：打开浏览器到GitHub源页面以获取 formula 。在本地查看公式历史： brew log -p formula

trans-unit.source: --hide: Act as if none of the provided hidden are installed. hidden should be comma-separated list of formulae.
trans-unit.target: --hide ：好像没有安装任何提供的 hidden 。 hidden 应以逗号分隔的公式列表。

trans-unit.source: --ignore-dependencies: An unsupported Homebrew development flag to skip installing any dependencies of any kind. If the dependencies are not already present, the formula will have issues. If you’re not developing Homebrew, consider adjusting your PATH rather than using this flag.
trans-unit.target: --ignore-dependencies ：不支持的Homebrew开发标志，可跳过安装任何类型的任何依赖项。如果依赖性尚不存在，则公式将出现问题。如果您不是在开发Homebrew，请考虑调整PATH，而不要使用此标志。

trans-unit.source: --ignore-dependencies: Don’t fail uninstall, even if formula is a dependency of any installed formulae.
trans-unit.target: --ignore-dependencies ：即使 formula 是任何已安装公式的依赖项，也不要卸载失败。

trans-unit.source: --ignore-pinned: Set a 0 exit code even if pinned formulae are not upgraded.
trans-unit.target: --ignore-pinned ：即使不升级固定的公式，也设置一个0退出代码。

trans-unit.source: --ignore-whitespace: Silently ignore whitespace discrepancies when applying diffs.
trans-unit.target: --ignore-whitespace ：应用差异时，静默忽略空白差异。

trans-unit.target: --include-aliases ：包括内部命令的别名。

trans-unit.target: --include-build ：包括 :build formula 依赖项。

trans-unit.source: --include-test: Include :test dependencies for formula (non-recursive).

trans-unit.source: --include-test: Include all formulae that specify formula as :test type dependency.
trans-unit.target: --include-test ：包括所有将公式指定为 :test type依赖项的 formula 。

trans-unit.source: --include-test: Install testing dependencies required to run brew test.
trans-unit.target: --include-test ：安装运行 brew test 所需的测试依赖项。

trans-unit.source: --installed: Display information on all installed taps.
trans-unit.target: --installed ：显示所有已安装水龙头的信息。

trans-unit.source: --installed: List dependencies for formulae that are currently installed. If formula is specified, list only its dependencies that are currently installed.
trans-unit.target: --installed ：列出当前安装的公式的依赖性。如果指定了 formula 则仅列出其当前安装的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: --installed: Only list installed formulae.
trans-unit.target: --installed ：仅列出已安装的公式。

trans-unit.source: --installed: Print JSON of formulae that are currently installed.

trans-unit.target: --json ：打印 formula 的JSON表示形式。目前默认和唯一可接受的值 version 是 v1 。有关使用JSON输出的示例，请参阅文档：https : //docs.brew.sh/Querying-Brew

trans-unit.source: --json: Print output in JSON format. Currently the default and only accepted value for version is v1. See the docs for examples of using the JSON output: https://docs.brew.sh/Querying-Brew

trans-unit.target: --mirror ：使用提供的 URL 作为镜像URL。

trans-unit.source: --new-formula: Run various additional style checks to determine if a new formula is eligible for Homebrew. This should be used when creating new formula and implies --strict and --online.
trans-unit.target: --new-formula ：运行各种其他样式检查，以确定新公式是否符合Homebrew的条件。在创建新公式时应使用此方法，并且意味着 --strict 和 --online 。

trans-unit.target: --no-compat ：运行测试时不要加载兼容性层。

trans-unit.source: --no-fetch: Homebrew will not download URL to the cache and will thus not add the SHA-256 to the formula for you, nor will it check the GitHub API for GitHub projects (to fill out its description and homepage).
trans-unit.target: --no-fetch ：Homebrew不会将 URL 下载到缓存中，因此不会为您添加SHA-256到公式中，也不会检查GitHub项目的GitHub API（以填写其描述和首页）。

trans-unit.source: --no-pbcopy: Do not copy anything to the system clipboard.

trans-unit.target: --no-publish ：不要将瓶子发布到Bintray。

trans-unit.target: --no-rebuild ：如果公式指定了重建版本，则将其从生成的DSL中删除。

trans-unit.target: --oneline ：每次提交仅输出一行。

trans-unit.target: --online ：包括使用GitHub API的测试以及使用官方外部命令的任何点击的测试。

trans-unit.source: --online: Run additional slower style checks that require a network connection.
trans-unit.target: --online ：运行其他需要网络连接的较慢样式检查。

trans-unit.target: --only-cops ：指定一个逗号分隔的 cops 列表，以检查是否仅违反列出的RuboCop警察。

trans-unit.target: --only-dependencies ：使用指定的选项安装依赖项，但不安装指定的公式。

trans-unit.target: --only ：只运行 test_script _spec.rb 。附加 : line_number 将在特定行开始。

trans-unit.target: --only ：指定以逗号分隔的 method 列表，以仅运行名为 audit_ method 的方法。

trans-unit.target: --opensuse ：在给定的包管理器列表中搜索 text 。

trans-unit.target: --patch ： formula 补丁将应用于未打包的源。

trans-unit.target: --pinned ：显示固定式，或仅在指定的（钉扎）公式的版本，如果 formula 中给出。另请参见 pin ， unpin 。

trans-unit.target: --prune-prefix ：仅修剪前缀中的符号链接和目录，不删除其他文件。

trans-unit.source: --root-url: Use the specified URL as the root of the bottle’s URL instead of Homebrew’s default.
trans-unit.target: --root-url ：使用指定的 URL 作为瓶子URL的根，而不是Homebrew的默认URL。

trans-unit.source: --rootis used when installing into a prefix that will not become part of the final installation location of the files, like when building a .rpm or binary distribution. When using a setup.py-based setuptools, --root has the side effect of activating --single-version-externally-managed. It is not safe to use --root with an empty --prefix because the root is removed from paths when byte-compiling modules.
trans-unit.target: --root 在安装到不会成为文件最终安装位置一部分的前缀时使用，例如在构建.rpm或二进制发行版时。当使用 setup.py 基setuptools的， --root 具有激活的副作用 --single-version-externally-managed 。将 --root 与空的 --prefix 一起使用是不安全的，因为在字节编译模块时， root 已从路径中删除。

trans-unit.source: --seed: Randomise tests with the provided value instead of a random seed.

trans-unit.source: --set-name: Set the name of the new formula to the provided name.

trans-unit.source: --set-version: Set the version of the new formula to the provided version.

trans-unit.source: --sha256: Specify the SHA-256 checksum of the new download.

trans-unit.source: --shell: Generate a list of environment variables for the specified shell, or --shell=auto to detect the current shell.

trans-unit.source: --single-version-externally-managed (“SVEM”) is a setuptools-only argument to setup.py install. The primary effect of SVEM is to use distutils to perform the install instead of using setuptools’ easy_install.
trans-unit.target: --single-version-externally-managed （“ SVEM”）是 setup.py install 的仅setuptools的参数。SVEM的主要作用是使用distutils进行安装，而不是使用setuptools的 easy_install 。

trans-unit.source: --tag: Specify the new git commit tag for the formula.

trans-unit.source: --tap: Generate the new formula in the provided tap, specified as user/repo.

trans-unit.source: --test: Display only missing libraries and exit with a non-zero status if any missing libraries are found.
trans-unit.target: --test ：仅显示缺少的库，如果发现任何缺少的库，则以非零状态退出。

trans-unit.source: --to-tag: Set HOMEBREW_UPDATE_TO_TAG to test updating between tags.
trans-unit.target: --to-tag ：设置 HOMEBREW_UPDATE_TO_TAG 以测试标签之间的更新。

trans-unit.source: --tree: Show dependencies as a tree. When given multiple formula arguments, show individual trees for each formula.
trans-unit.target: --tree ：将依赖关系显示为树。给定多个公式参数时，请为每个公式显示单独的树。

trans-unit.source: --ubuntu: Search for text in the given package manager’s list.
trans-unit.target: --ubuntu ：在给定的程序包管理器列表中搜索 text 。

trans-unit.source: --unbrewed: List all files in the Homebrew prefix not installed by Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: --unbrewed ：列出Homebrew前缀中未由Homebrew安装的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: --union: Show the union of dependencies for multiple formula, instead of the intersection.
trans-unit.target: --union ：显示多个 formula 的依赖项并集，而不是交集。

trans-unit.source: --url: Specify the URL for the new download. If a URL is specified, the SHA-256 checksum of the new download should also be specified.
trans-unit.target: --url ：指定新下载的 URL 。如果指定了 URL ，则还应指定新下载内容的 SHA-256 校验和。

trans-unit.source: --version: Explicitly set the provided version of the package being installed.
trans-unit.target: --version ：显式设置要安装的软件包的提供的 version 。

trans-unit.source: --version: Extract the provided version of formula instead of the most recent.
trans-unit.target: --version ：提取提供的 formula version ，而不是最新版本。

trans-unit.source: --version: Use the provided version to override the value parsed from the URL or tag. Note that --version=0 can be used to delete an existing version override from a formula if it has become redundant.
trans-unit.target: --version ：使用提供的 version 覆盖从URL或标记解析的值。请注意， --version=0 可用于从公式中删除现有的版本替代（如果已变得多余）。

trans-unit.source: --versions: Show the version number for installed formulae, or only the specified formulae if formula are given.
trans-unit.target: --versions ：显示版本号为安装式，或仅在指定的公式，如果 formula 中给出。

trans-unit.source: --warn-on-publish-failure: Do not exit if there’s a failure publishing bottles on Bintray.
trans-unit.target: --warn-on-publish-failure ：如果在Bintray上发布瓶子失败，请不要退出。

trans-unit.source: --with-hostname: Include the hostname in the Gist.
trans-unit.target: --with-hostname ：在Gist中包括主机名。

trans-unit.source: --write: When passed along with --dry-run, perform a not-so-dry run by making the expected file modifications but not taking any Git actions.
trans-unit.target: --write ：与 --dry-run 一起传递时，请通过进行预期的文件修改而不执行任何Git动作来执行非常规运行。

trans-unit.source: --write: Write the changes to the formula file. A new commit will be generated unless --no-commit is passed.
trans-unit.target: --write ：将更改写入公式文件。除非通过 --no-commit ,否则将生成一个新的提交。

trans-unit.source: -1, --max-count: Output only one commit.
trans-unit.target: -1 ，-- --max-count ：仅输出一次提交。

trans-unit.source: -1: Force output to be one entry per line. This is the default when output is not to a terminal.
trans-unit.target: -1 ：强制输出为每行一个条目。当不输出到终端时，这是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: -D, --audit-debug: Enable debugging and profiling of audit methods.
trans-unit.target: -D ，-- --audit-debug ：启用审计方法的调试和概要分析。

trans-unit.source: -d, --debug: Display any debugging information.
trans-unit.target: -d ， --debug ：显示任何调试信息。

trans-unit.source: -d, --description: Search just the descriptions for provided text. If text is flanked by slashes, it is interpreted as a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -d ，-- --description ：仅搜索描述中提供的 text 。如果 text 两侧带有斜杠，则将其解释为正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: -e: Execute the provided string argument as a script.
trans-unit.target: -e ：将提供的字符串参数作为脚本执行。

trans-unit.source: -f, --force: Override warnings and enable potentially unsafe operations.
trans-unit.target: -f ， --force ：覆盖警告，使潜在的不安全操作。

trans-unit.source: -g, --git: Create a Git repository, useful for creating patches to the software.
trans-unit.target: -g ，-- --git ：创建一个Git存储库，可用于创建软件补丁。

trans-unit.source: -g, --git: Initialise a Git repository in the unpacked source. This is useful for creating patches for the software.
trans-unit.target: -g ，-- --git ：在解压缩的源代码中初始化Git存储库。这对于为软件创建补丁很有用。

trans-unit.source: -i, --interactive: Download and patch formula, then open a shell. This allows the user to run ./configure --help and otherwise determine how to turn the software package into a Homebrew package.
trans-unit.target: -i ，-- --interactive ：下载并修补 formula ，然后打开一个外壳。这允许用户运行 ./configure --help ，否则可以确定如何将软件包转换为Homebrew软件包。

trans-unit.source: -l: List in long format. If the output is to a terminal, a total sum for all the file sizes is output on a line before the long listing.
trans-unit.target: -l ：以长格式列出。如果输出到终端，则在长列表之前的一行上输出所有文件大小的总和。

trans-unit.source: -n, --dry-run: List all files which would be linked or deleted by brew link --overwrite, but will not actually link or delete any files.
trans-unit.target: -n ，-- --dry-run ：列出将通过 brew link --overwrite 链接或删除的所有文件，但实际上不会链接或删除任何文件。

trans-unit.source: -n, --dry-run: List all files which would be unlinked, but will not actually unlink or delete any files.
trans-unit.target: -n ，-- --dry-run ：列出所有将取消链接但实际上不会取消链接或删除任何文件的文件。

trans-unit.source: -n, --dry-run: Print what would be done rather than doing it.
trans-unit.target: -n ，-- --dry-run ：打印将要执行的操作，而不是执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: -n, --dry-run: Show what would be removed, but do not actually remove anything.
trans-unit.target: -n ，-- --dry-run ：显示要删除的内容，但实际上不删除任何内容。

trans-unit.source: -n, --name: Search just the names for provided text. If text is flanked by slashes, it is interpreted as a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -n ， --name ：搜索只是为所提供的名称 text 。如果 text 两侧带有斜杠，则将其解释为正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: -n, --new-issue: Automatically create a new issue in the appropriate GitHub repository as well as creating the Gist.
trans-unit.target: -n ， --new-issue new -issue：在适当的GitHub存储库中自动创建一个新发行版，并创建Gist。

trans-unit.source: -n: Show dependencies in topological order.
trans-unit.target: -n ：以拓扑顺序显示依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: -p, --patch: Also output patch from commit.
trans-unit.target: -p ，-- --patch ：还从提交输出补丁。

trans-unit.source: -p, --private: The Gist will be marked private and will not appear in listings but will be accessible with the link.
trans-unit.target: -p ，-- --private ：要点将被标记为私有，并且不会出现在列表中，但是可以通过链接访问。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quiet: Suppress any warnings.
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quiet ：禁止显示任何警告。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quieter: Suppress any warnings.
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quieter ：禁止显示任何警告。

trans-unit.source: -r: Reverse the order of the sort to get the oldest entries first.
trans-unit.target: -r ：颠倒排序顺序以首先获取最早的条目。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Compile formula from source even if a bottle is available.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：即使有瓶也可以从源代码编译 formula 。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Compile the specified formula from source even if a bottle is provided. Dependencies will still be installed from bottles if they are available.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：即使提供了瓶子，也可以从源代码编译指定的 formula 。如果有依赖关系，将仍然从瓶子中安装依赖项。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Download the source for rather than a bottle.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：下载源代码而不是瓶子。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Show the cache file used when building from source.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：显示从源构建时使用的缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: -s, --search: Search both name and description for provided text. If text is flanked by slashes, it is interpreted as a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --search ：在名称和描述中搜索提供的 text 。如果 text 两侧带有斜杠，则将其解释为正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: -s: Scrub the cache, including downloads for even the latest versions. Note downloads for any installed formula or cask will still not be deleted. If you want to delete those too: rm -rf "$(brew --cache)"
trans-unit.target: -s ：清除缓存，包括最新版本的下载。注意对于任何已安装的公式或酒桶的下载仍不会被删除。如果您也要删除它们： rm -rf "$(brew --cache)"

trans-unit.source: -t: Sort by time modified (most recently modified first).
trans-unit.target: -t ：按修改时间排序（最近修改的优先）。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: Make some output more verbose.
trans-unit.target: -v ， --verbose ：请一些输出更详细。

trans-unit.source: /sw and /opt/local because build scripts get confused when Homebrew is there instead of Fink or MacPorts, respectively.
trans-unit.target: /sw 和 /opt/local ,因为当Homebrew而不是Fink或MacPorts出现时，构建脚本会变得混乱。

trans-unit.source: /tmp subdirectories because Homebrew gets upset.
trans-unit.target: /tmp 子目录，因为Homebrew不高兴。

trans-unit.source: /usr/local/bin is already in your PATH.
trans-unit.target: /usr/local/bin 已经在您的 PATH 中。

trans-unit.source: :build means that dependency is a build-time only dependency so it can be skipped when installing from a bottle or when listing missing dependencies using brew missing.
trans-unit.target: :build 表示依赖项是仅构建时的依赖项，因此从瓶子安装或使用 brew missing 列出缺少的依赖项时可以跳过。

trans-unit.source: :optional generates an implicit with-foo option for the formula. This means that, given depends_on "foo" => :optional, the user must pass --with-foo in order to use the dependency.
trans-unit.target: :optional 为公式生成一个隐式的 with-foo 选项。这意味着，给定 depends_on "foo" => :optional ，用户必须传递 --with-foo 才能使用依赖项。

trans-unit.source: :recommended generates an implicit without-foo option, meaning that the dependency is enabled by default and the user must pass --without-foo to disable this dependency. The default description can be overridden using the normal option syntax (in this case, the option declaration must precede the dependency):
trans-unit.target: :recommended 生成一个隐式的 without-foo 选项，这意味着默认情况下启用了依赖关系，并且用户必须传递 --without-foo 来禁用此依赖关系。可以使用普通的选项语法覆盖默认描述（在这种情况下，选项声明必须在依赖项之前）：

trans-unit.source: :test means that dependency is only required when running brew test.
trans-unit.target: :test 表示仅在运行 brew test 时才需要依赖项。

trans-unit.source: :using value
trans-unit.target: :using 使用价值

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_ARCH: Linux only: If set, Homebrew will pass the set value to type name to the compiler’s -march option instead of using the default (-march=native).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_ARCH ：仅Linux：如果设置，Homebrew会将设置名称类型的值传递给编译器的 -march 选项，而不是使用默认值（ -march=native ）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN: If set, instructs Homebrew to prefix all download URLs, including those for bottles, with this variable. For example, HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 will cause a formula with the URL https://example.com/foo.tar.gz to instead download from http://localhost:8080/example.com/foo.tar.gz.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew使用此变量为所有下载URL（包括瓶子的URL）添加前缀。例如， HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 将导致URL为 https://example.com/foo.tar.gz 的公式改为从 http://localhost:8080/example.com/foo.tar.gz 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_AUTO_UPDATE_SECS: If set, Homebrew will only check for autoupdates once per this seconds interval.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_AUTO_UPDATE_SECS ：如果设置，Homebrew将仅在此秒间隔内检查一次自动更新。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, HOMEBREW_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: When using the S3 download strategy, Homebrew will look in these variables for access credentials (see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-chap-getting-started.html#cli-environment to retrieve these access credentials from AWS). If they are not set, the S3 download strategy will download with a public (unsigned) URL.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID ， HOMEBREW_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY ：使用 S3 下载策略时，Homebrew将在这些变量中查找访问凭证（请参阅https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-chap-getting-started.html# cli环境以从AWS检索这些访问凭证）。如果未设置，则 S3 下载策略将使用公共（未签名）URL下载。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN: By default, Homebrew uses https://homebrew.bintray.com/ as its download mirror for bottles. If set, instructs Homebrew to instead use the specified URL. For example, HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 will cause all bottles to download from the prefix http://localhost:8080/.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN ：默认情况下，Homebrew使用 https://homebrew.bintray.com/ 作为其瓶子的下载镜像。如果设置，则指示Homebrew改用指定的URL。例如， HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 将导致所有瓶子从前缀 http://localhost:8080/ 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_BROWSER: If set, Homebrew uses this setting as the browser when opening project homepages, instead of the OS default browser.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_BROWSER ：如果设置，Homebrew在打开项目主页时将使用此设置作为浏览器，而不是OS默认浏览器。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CACHE: If set, instructs Homebrew to use the specified directory as the download cache.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CACHE ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew使用指定的目录作为下载缓存。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CURLRC: If set, Homebrew will not pass -q when invoking curl(1) (which disables the use of curlrc).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CURLRC ：如果设置，则在调用 curl （1）时Homebrew将不会通过 -q （这将禁用 curlrc 的使用）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CURL_RETRIES: If set, Homebrew will pass the given retry count to --retry when invoking curl(1).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CURL_RETRIES ：如果设置，家酿将通过给定的重试次数 --retry 调用时 curl （1）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CURL_VERBOSE: If set, Homebrew will pass --verbose when invoking curl(1).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CURL_VERBOSE ：如果设置，则在调用 curl （1）时Homebrew将通过 --verbose 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DEBUG: If set, any commands that can emit debugging information will do so.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DEBUG ：如果设置，则任何可以发出调试信息的命令都会这样做。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER: If set, Homebrew will tweak behaviour to be more relevant for Homebrew developers (active or budding), e.g. turning warnings into errors.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER ：如果设置，Homebrew将调整行为，使其与Homebrew开发人员（活动或萌芽）更加相关，例如将警告变为错误。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY: If set, Homebrew will use this X11 display when opening a page in a browser, for example with brew home. Primarily useful on Linux.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY ：如果设置，Homebrew在浏览器（例如 brew home 打开页面时将使用此X11显示。在Linux上主要有用。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY_INSTALL_TIMES: If set, Homebrew will print install times for each formula at the end of the run.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY_INSTALL_TIMES ：如果设置，Homebrew将在运行结束时为每个公式打印安装时间。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_EDITOR: If set, Homebrew will use this editor when editing a single formula, or several formulae in the same directory.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_EDITOR ：如果设置，Homebrew将在编辑单个公式或同一目录中的多个公式时使用此编辑器。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_CURL: If set, Homebrew will always use a Homebrew-installed curl rather than the system version. Automatically set if the system version of curl is too old.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_CURL ：如果设置，Homebrew将始终使用Homebrew安装的 curl ,而不是系统版本。如果 curl 的系统版本太旧，则自动设置。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_GIT: If set, Homebrew will always use a Homebrew-installed git rather than the system version. Automatically set if the system version of git is too old.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_GIT ：如果设置，Homebrew将始终使用Homebrew安装的 git 而不是系统版本。如果 git 的系统版本太旧，则自动设置。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_FORCE_VENDOR_RUBY: If set, Homebrew will always use its vendored, relocatable Ruby version even if the system version of Ruby is new enough.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_FORCE_VENDOR_RUBY ：如果设置，Homebrew将始终使用其可供应的，可重定位的Ruby版本，即使Ruby的系统版本足够新。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN: A personal access token for the GitHub API, used by Homebrew for features such as brew search. You can create one at https://github.com/settings/tokens. If set, GitHub will allow you a greater number of API requests. For more information, see: https://developer.github.com/v3/#rate-limiting
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN ：GitHub API的个人访问令牌，由Homebrew用来实现 brew search 之类的功能。您可以在https://github.com/settings/tokens创建一个。如果设置，GitHub将允许您更多的API请求。有关更多信息，请参见：https : //developer.github.com/v3/#rate-limiting

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE: Text printed before the installation summary of each successful build.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE ：在每个成功构建的安装摘要之前打印的文本。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_LOGS: If set, Homebrew will use the specified directory to store log files.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_LOGS ：如果设置，Homebrew将使用指定的目录来存储日志文件。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: If set, instructs Homebrew to use the value of HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS as the number of parallel jobs to run when building with make(1).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew使用 HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS 的值作为使用 make （1）进行构建时要运行的并行作业的数量。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS: If set, Homebrew will not send analytics. See: https://docs.brew.sh/Analytics
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS ：如果设置，Homebrew将不发送分析。请参阅：https：//docs.brew.sh/Analytics

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE: If set, Homebrew will not auto-update before running brew install, brew upgrade or brew tap.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE ：如果设置，Homebrew在运行 brew install ， brew upgrade 或 brew tap 之前不会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_BOTTLE_SOURCE_FALLBACK: If set, Homebrew will fail on the failure of installation from a bottle rather than falling back to building from source.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_BOTTLE_SOURCE_FALLBACK ：如果设置，Homebrew将在无法从瓶子安装的情况下失败，而不是从源头退回到构建。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_COLOR: If set, Homebrew will not print text with colour added.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_COLOR ：如果设置，Homebrew将不会打印添加颜色的文本。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_EMOJI: If set, Homebrew will not print the HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE on a successful build.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_EMOJI ：如果设置，Homebrew将不会在成功的构建中打印 HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_GITHUB_API: If set, Homebrew will not use the GitHub API, e.g. for searches or fetching relevant issues on a failed install.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_GITHUB_API ：如果设置，Homebrew将不使用GitHub API，例如用于搜索或在安装失败时获取相关问题。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT: If set, Homebrew will not permit redirects from secure HTTPS to insecure HTTP.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT ：如果设置，Homebrew将不允许从安全HTTPS重定向到不安全HTTP。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_INSTALL_CLEANUP: If set, brew install, brew upgrade and brew reinstall will never automatically cleanup the installed/upgraded/reinstalled formulae or all formulae every 30 days.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_INSTALL_CLEANUP ：如果设置，则 brew install ， brew upgrade 和 brew reinstall 将永远不会每30天自动清理一次已安装/已升级/已重新安装的公式或所有公式。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_PREFIX, HOMEBREW_CELLAR and HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY are also exported to save multiple queries of those variables.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_PREFIX 还导出HOMEBREW_PREFIX， HOMEBREW_CELLAR 和 HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY 以保存这些变量的多个查询。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_PRY: If set, Homebrew will use Pry for the brew irb command.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_PRY ：如果设置，Homebrew将使用Pry作为 brew irb 命令。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_SVN: When exporting from Subversion, Homebrew will use HOMEBREW_SVN if set, a Homebrew-built Subversion if installed, or the system-provided binary.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_SVN ：从Subversion导出时，Homebrew将使用 HOMEBREW_SVN (如果已设置），Homebrew内置的Subversion（如果已安装）或系统提供的二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_TEMP: If set, instructs Homebrew to use HOMEBREW_TEMP as the temporary directory for building packages. This may be needed if your system temp directory and Homebrew prefix are on different volumes, as macOS has trouble moving symlinks across volumes when the target does not yet exist.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_TEMP ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew将 HOMEBREW_TEMP 用作构建软件包的临时目录。如果您的系统临时目录和Homebrew前缀位于不同的卷上，则可能需要这样做，因为当目标尚不存在时，macOS在跨卷移动符号链接时会遇到麻烦。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_UPDATE_TO_TAG: If set, instructs Homebrew to always use the latest stable tag (even if developer commands have been run).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_UPDATE_TO_TAG ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew始终使用最新的稳定标记（即使已运行开发人员命令）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_VERBOSE: If set, Homebrew always assumes --verbose when running commands.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_VERBOSE ：如果设置，运行命令时，Homebrew始终假定 --verbose 。

trans-unit.source: brew link --force creates a warning in brew doctor to let both you and maintainers know that a link exists that could be causing issues. If you’ve linked something and there’s no problems at all? Feel free to ignore the brew doctor error.
trans-unit.target: brew link --force 在 brew doctor 创建警告，让您和维护人员都知道存在可能导致问题的链接。如果您已链接了某件东西，那根本没有问题吗？随意忽略 brew doctor 错误。

trans-unit.source: brew tap <user/repo> <URL> makes a shallow clone of the repository at URL. Unlike the one-argument version, URL is not assumed to be GitHub, and it doesn’t have to be HTTP. Any location and any protocol that Git can handle is fine.
trans-unit.target: brew tap <user/repo> <URL> 仓库> <URL>在URL处对存储库进行浅表克隆。与单参数版本不同，URL不假定为GitHub，也不必假定为HTTP。Git可以处理的任何位置和协议都可以。

trans-unit.source: brew tap <user/repo> makes a shallow clone of the repository at https://github.com/user/repo. After that, brew will be able to work on those formulae as if they were in Homebrew’s canonical repository. You can install and uninstall them with brew [un]install, and the formulae are automatically updated when you run brew update. (See below for details about how brew tap handles the names of repositories.)
trans-unit.target: brew tap <user/repo> 在https://github.com/user/repo上对存储库进行了浅表克隆。之后， brew 将能够处理这些公式，就像它们在Homebrew的规范存储库中一样。您可以使用 brew [un]install 安装和卸载它们，并且在运行 brew update 时会自动更新公式。（有关 brew tap 如何处理存储库名称的详细信息，请参见下文。）

trans-unit.source: brew tap --repair migrates tapped formulae from a symlink-based to directory-based structure. (This should only need to be run once.)
trans-unit.target: brew tap --repair 将窃听的公式从基于符号链接的结构迁移到基于目录的结构。（这只需要运行一次。）

trans-unit.source: brew tap adds more repositories to the list of formulae that brew tracks, updates, and installs from. By default, tap assumes that the repositories come from GitHub, but the command isn’t limited to any one location.
trans-unit.target: brew tap 将更多存储库添加到 brew 跟踪，更新和安装的公式列表中。默认情况下， tap 假定存储库来自GitHub，但是命令不限于任何一个位置。

trans-unit.source: superenv is our “super environment” that isolates builds by removing /usr/local/bin and all user PATHs that are not essential for the build. It does this because user PATHs are often full of stuff that breaks builds. superenv also removes bad flags from the commands passed to clang/gcc and injects others (for example all keg_only dependencies are added to the -I and -L flags).
trans-unit.target: superenv 是我们的“超级环境”，它通过删除 /usr/local/bin 和所有对于构建不是必需的用户 PATH 来隔离构建。这样做是因为用户 PATH 通常充满了破坏构建的内容。 superenv 还会从传递给 clang / gcc 的命令中删除错误标志，并注入其他标志（例如，所有 keg_only 依赖项都添加到 -I 和 -L 标志中）。

trans-unit.source: A tap is Homebrew-speak for a Git repository containing extra formulae. Homebrew has the capability to add (and remove) multiple taps to your local installation with the brew tap and brew untap commands. Type man brew in your terminal. The main repository at https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core, often called homebrew/core, is always built-in.

trans-unit.source: A keg_only :versioned_formula should not post_install anything in the HOMEBREW_PREFIX that conflicts with or duplicates the non-versioned counterpart (or other versioned formulae). For example, a node@6 formula should not install its npm into HOMEBREW_PREFIX like the node formula does.
trans-unit.target: 一个 keg_only :versioned_formula 不应该 post_install 在任何 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 与冲突或重复的非版本对应（或与其它版本的公式）。例如， node@6 公式不应像 node 公式那样将其 npm 安装到 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 中。

trans-unit.source: A formula is a package definition written in Ruby. It can be created with brew create <URL> where <URL> is a zip or tarball, installed with brew install <formula>, and debugged with brew install --debug --verbose <formula>. Formulae use the Formula API which provides various Homebrew-specific helpers.
trans-unit.target: 甲式是Ruby编写的包定义。可以使用 brew create <URL> (其中 <URL> 是zip或tarball）创建它，并通过 brew install <formula> 安装，并使用 brew install --debug --verbose <formula> 进行调试。公式使用公式API，该API提供各种特定于Homebrew的帮助器。

trans-unit.source: A Homebrew analytics user ID, e.g. 1BAB65CC-FE7F-4D8C-AB45-B7DB5A6BA9CB. This is generated by uuidgen and stored in the repository-specific Git configuration variable homebrew.analyticsuuid within $(brew --repository)/.git/config. This does not allow us to track individual users but does enable us to accurately measure user counts vs. event counts (https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/protocol/v1/parameters#cid)
trans-unit.target: 自制分析用户ID，例如 1BAB65CC-FE7F-4D8C-AB45-B7DB5A6BA9CB 。这是由 uuidgen 生成的，并存储在 $(brew --repository)/.git/config 特定于存储库的Git配置变量 homebrew.analyticsuuid 中。这不允许我们跟踪单个用户，但可以使我们准确地衡量用户数量与事件数量（https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/protocol/v1/parameters#cid）

trans-unit.source: A String (e.g. "jpeg") specifies a formula dependency.
trans-unit.target: 字符串（例如 "jpeg" ）指定公式依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Additional commands, including external commands, can of course be written to provide more detailed information. There are a couple of disadvantages here. First, it means writing Ruby against a possibly changing Homebrew codebase. There will be more code to touch during refactors, and Homebrew can’t guarantee that external commands will continue to work. Second, it means designing the commands themselves, specifying input parameters and output formats.
trans-unit.target: 当然，可以编写其他命令（包括外部命令）以提供更多详细信息。这里有两个缺点。首先，这意味着针对可能更改的Homebrew代码库编写Ruby。重构期间会有更多代码需要触摸，而且Homebrew无法保证外部命令将继续起作用。其次，这意味着自己设计命令，指定输入参数和输出格式。

trans-unit.source: Also note that such a formula would only be compatible with the same Node major version it originally was compiled with. This means that we need to revision every formula with a Node native addon with every major version bump of the node formula. To make sure we don’t overlook your formula on a Node major version bump, write a meaningful test which would fail in such a case (invoked with an ABI-incompatible Node version).

trans-unit.source: An executable script for a command named extcmd should be named brew-extcmd. The script itself can use any suitable shebang (#!) line, so an external script can be written in Bash, Ruby, or even Python. Unlike the ruby commands this file must not end with a language-specific suffix (.sh, or .py). This file will be run via exec with some Homebrew variables set as environment variables, and passed any additional command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 名为 extcmd 的命令的可执行脚本应命名为 brew-extcmd 。该脚本本身可以使用任何合适的shebang（ #! ）行，因此可以使用Bash，Ruby甚至Python编写外部脚本。与ruby命令不同，此文件不得以特定于语言的后缀（ .sh 或 .py ）结尾。该文件将通过 exec 运行，并将某些Homebrew变量设置为环境变量，并传递任何其他命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: An external command extcmd implemented as a Ruby command should be named brew-extcmd.rb. The command is executed by doing a require on the full pathname. As the command is required, it has full access to the Homebrew “environment”, i.e. all global variables and modules that any internal command has access to. Be wary of using Homebrew internals; they may change at any time without warning.
trans-unit.target: 实现为Ruby命令的外部命令 extcmd 应该命名为 brew-extcmd.rb 。通过对完整路径名执行 require 命令来执行该命令。由于该命令是 require ，因此它具有对Homebrew“环境”的完全访问权限，即，任何内部命令均可访问的所有全局变量和模块。警惕使用Homebrew内部构件；它们可能随时更改而不会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Another example would be configuration files that should not be overwritten on package upgrades. If after installation you find that to-be-persisted configuration files are not copied but instead symlinked into /usr/local/etc/ from the Cellar, this can often be rectified by passing an appropriate argument to the package’s configure script. That argument will vary depending on a given package’s configure script and/or Makefile, but one example might be: --sysconfdir=#{etc}
trans-unit.target: 另一个示例是在软件包升级时不应覆盖的配置文件。如果在安装后发现未复制的持久配置文件而是从地窖符号链接到 /usr/local/etc/ ，则通常可以通过将适当的参数传递给软件包的configure脚本来纠正此错误。该参数根据给定程序包的配置脚本和/或Makefile的不同而不同，但是一个示例可能是：-- --sysconfdir=#{etc}

trans-unit.source: Apple has assigned this directory for non-system utilities. This means there are no files in /usr/local by default, so there is no need to worry about messing up existing or system tools.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Applications should be installed into a Python virtualenv environment rooted in libexec. This prevents the app’s Python modules from contaminating the system site-packages and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 应将应用程序安装到以 libexec 为根的Python virtualenv环境中。这样可以防止应用程序的Python模块污染系统站点包，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Applications should unconditionally bundle all of their Python-language dependencies and libraries and should install any unsatisfied dependencies; these strategies are discussed in depth in the following sections.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应该无条件地捆绑所有的Python语言依赖和库,并且应该安装任何不满意的依赖;这些策略将在下面的章节中深入讨论。

trans-unit.source: Applications that are compatible with Python 2 should use the Apple-provided system Python in /usr/bin on systems that provide Python 2.7. No explicit Python dependency is needed since /usr/bin is always in PATH for Homebrew formulae.
trans-unit.target: 与Python 2兼容的应用程序应在提供Python 2.7的系统上使用Apple在 /usr/bin 中提供的系统Python。不需要显式的Python依赖关系，因为 /usr/bin 始终位于Homebrew公式的 PATH 中。

trans-unit.source: As Homebrew became primarily a binary package manager, most users were fulfilling Requirements with the default_formula, not with arbitrary alternatives. To improve quality and reduce variation, Homebrew now exclusively supports using the default formula, as an ordinary dependency, and no longer supports using arbitrary alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 随着Homebrew主要成为二进制软件包管理器，大多数用户都使用 default_formula 而不是任意替代方案来满足 Requirement 。为了提高质量并减少变化，Homebrew现在专门支持使用默认公式作为普通的依赖项，并且不再支持使用任意替代方法。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, conflicts_with should be a last-resort option. It’s a fairly blunt instrument.
trans-unit.target: 通常， conflicts_with 应该是最后一种选择。这是一个相当钝的乐器。

trans-unit.source: As a result, we recommend you give formulae a different name if you want to make them easier to install. Note that there is (intentionally) no way of replacing dependencies of core formulae with those from taps.
trans-unit.target: 因此,如果你想让公式更容易安装,我们建议你给公式起一个不同的名字。请注意,没有办法将核心公式的依赖关系替换为来自tap的依赖关系(故意的)。

trans-unit.source: As far as we can tell it would be impossible for Google to match the randomly generated Homebrew-only analytics user ID to any other Google Analytics user ID. If Google turned evil the only thing they could do would be to lie about anonymising IP addresses and attempt to match users based on IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 据我们所知,谷歌不可能将随机生成的Homebrew-only分析用户ID与任何其他谷歌分析用户ID进行匹配。如果谷歌变坏,他们唯一能做的就是骗取IP地址的匿名化,并试图根据IP地址匹配用户。

trans-unit.source: Ask for clarification of anything you don’t understand and for help with anything you don’t know how to do.
trans-unit.target: 要求您澄清任何您不了解的内容，并寻求有关您不知道该怎么做的帮助。

trans-unit.source: At Homebrew, we like to put the name of the formula up front like so: foobar 7.3 (new formula). This may seem crazy short, but you’ll find that forcing yourself to summarise the commit encourages you to be atomic and concise. If you can’t summarise it in 50-80 characters, you’re probably trying to commit two commits as one. For a more thorough explanation, please read Tim Pope’s excellent blog post, A Note About Git Commit Messages.
trans-unit.target: 在Homebrew，我们喜欢像这样将公式的名称放在前面： foobar 7.3 (new formula) 。这可能看起来很疯狂，但是您会发现，强迫自己总结一下提交会鼓励您保持原子性和简洁性。如果您不能用50-80个字符来概括它，则可能是试图将两次提交作为一次提交。有关更详尽的解释，请阅读Tim Pope的精彩博客文章“ 关于Git提交消息的注释”。

trans-unit.source: Bottles are created using the Brew Test Bot. This happens mostly when people submit pull requests to Homebrew and the bottle do block is updated by maintainers when they brew pull --bottle the contents of a pull request. For the Homebrew organisations’ taps they are uploaded to and downloaded from Bintray.
trans-unit.target: 使用Brew Test Bot创建瓶子。这种情况通常发生在以下情况：人们向 brew pull --bottle 提交拉取请求，并且维护者在冲泡拉装时更新了 bottle do 拉取请求的内容。对于Homebrew组织的水龙头，它们被上传到Bintray或从Bintray下载。

trans-unit.source: Bottles are produced by installing a formula with brew install --build-bottle <formula> and then bottling it with brew bottle <formula>. This outputs the bottle DSL which should be inserted into the formula file.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 brew install --build-bottle <formula> 安装公式，然后使用 brew bottle <formula> 装瓶来生产瓶子。这将输出应插入公式文件中的瓶子DSL。

trans-unit.source: Bottles are simple gzipped tarballs of compiled binaries. Any metadata is stored in a formula’s bottle DSL and in the bottle filename (i.e. macOS version, revision).
trans-unit.target: 瓶子是经过编译的二进制文件的简单压缩压缩包。任何元数据都存储在公式的瓶子DSL和瓶子文件名（即macOS版本，修订版）中。

trans-unit.source: Bottles have a DSL to be used in formulae which is contained in the bottle do ... end block.
trans-unit.target: 瓶子有一个用于 bottle do ... end 配方中的DSL 。

trans-unit.source: Bottles will not be used if the user requests it (see above), if the formula requests it (with pour_bottle?), if any options are specified during installation (bottles are all compiled with default options), if the bottle is not up to date (e.g. lacking a checksum) or if the bottle’s cellar is not :any nor equal to the current HOMEBREW_CELLAR.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户要求使用瓶子（请参见上文），如果公式要求（使用 pour_bottle? ），如果在安装过程中指定了任何选项（瓶子均使用默认选项编译），则不会使用瓶子。日期（例如，缺少校验和），或者瓶子的 cellar 不是 :any 也不等于当前的 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 。

trans-unit.source: By default packages that require BLAS/LAPACK linear algebra interfaces should link to OpenBLAS using depends_on "openblas" and passing -DBLA_VENDOR=OpenBLAS to CMake (applies to CMake based formula only) rather than Apple’s Accelerate framework, or the default reference lapack implementation. Apple’s implementation of BLAS/LAPACK is outdated and may introduce hard-to-debug problems. The reference lapack formula is fine, although it is not actively maintained or tuned. For this reason, formulae needing BLAS/LAPACK should link with OpenBLAS.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，需要BLAS / LAPACK线性代数接口的软件包应使用 depends_on "openblas" 链接到OpenBLAS，并将 -DBLA_VENDOR=OpenBLAS 传递给CMake（仅适用于基于CMake的公式），而不是Apple的Accelerate框架或默认的参考lapack实现。苹果公司对BLAS / LAPACK的实现已过时，可能会引入难以调试的问题。尽管没有积极维护或调整参考 lapack 公式，但它很好。因此，需要BLAS / LAPACK的公式应与OpenBLAS链接。

trans-unit.source: By default, uses shows all formulae that specify formula as a required or recommended dependency.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， uses 显示所有将公式指定为必需或建议依赖项的 formula 。

trans-unit.source: By default, uses shows usage of formula by stable builds.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， uses 通过稳定的版本显示 formula 的用法。

trans-unit.source: By default, bottles will be built for the oldest CPU supported by the OS/architecture you’re building for (Core 2 for 64-bit OSs). This ensures that bottles are compatible with all computers you might distribute them to. If you really want your bottles to be optimized for something else, you can pass the --bottle-arch= option to build for another architecture; for example, brew install foo --build-bottle --bottle-arch=penryn. Just remember that if you build for a newer architecture some of your users might get binaries they can’t run and that would be sad!
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将为您要为其构建的OS /体系结构所支持的最旧的CPU（针对64位OS的Core 2）构建Bottle。这样可以确保瓶子与您可能将其分发到的所有计算机兼容。如果您确实希望对瓶子进行其他优化，则可以传递 --bottle-arch= 选项以为其他体系结构进行构建。例如， brew install foo --build-bottle --bottle-arch=penryn 。只需记住，如果您为较新的体系结构进行构建，则您的某些用户可能会获得二进制文件，这些二进制文件将无法运行，这将是令人遗憾的！

trans-unit.source: Depending on the change you want to make, you need to send the pull request to the appropriate one of Homebrew’s main repositories. If you want to submit a change to Homebrew core code (the brew implementation), you should open the pull request on Homebrew/brew. If you want to submit a change for a formula, you should open the pull request on the homebrew/core tap or another official tap, based on the formula type.
trans-unit.target: 根据您要进行的更改，您需要将拉取请求发送到相应的Homebrew主存储库之一。如果要提交对Homebrew核心代码（ brew 实现）的更改，则应在Homebrew / brew上打开拉取请求。如果要提交公式更改，则应根据公式类型在自制/核心水龙头或其他官方水龙头上打开拉取请求。

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Detecting whether a setup.py uses setup() from setuptools or distutils is difficult, but we always need to pass this flag to setuptools-based scripts. pip faces the same problem that we do and forces setup() to use the setuptools version by loading a shim around setup.py that imports setuptools before doing anything else. Since setuptools monkey-patches distutils and replaces its setup function, this provides a single, consistent interface. We have borrowed this code and use it in Language::Python.setup_install_args.
trans-unit.target: 检测 setup.py 是使用setuptools还是distutils中的 setup() 是很困难的，但是我们总是需要将此标志传递给基于setuptools的脚本。 pip 面临与我们相同的问题，并通过在 setup.py 周围加载一个垫片来强制 setup() 使用setuptools版本，该垫片在执行其他操作之前会导入setuptools。由于setuptools会修补distutils并替换其 setup 功能，因此这提供了一个一致的接口。我们已经借用了此代码并将其用于 Language::Python.setup_install_args 。

trans-unit.source: Distribute (not to be confused with distutils) is an obsolete fork of setuptools. Distlib is a package maintained outside the standard library which is used by pip for some low-level packaging operations and is not relevant to most setup.py users.
trans-unit.target: 分发（不要与distutils混淆）是setuptools的过时分支。Distlib是在标准库外部维护的软件包，pip使用它来进行一些低级打包操作，并且与大多数 setup.py 用户无关。

trans-unit.source: Distutils and pip use a “flat” installation hierarchy that installs modules as individual files under site-packages while easy_install installs zipped eggs to site-packages instead.
trans-unit.target: Distutils和pip使用“扁平”安装层次结构，该模块将模块作为单独的文件安装在站点软件包下，而 easy_install 则将压缩的鸡蛋安装到站点软件包中。

trans-unit.source: Distutils is a module in the Python standard library that provides developers a basic package management API. Setuptools is a module distributed outside the standard library that extends distutils. It is a convention that Python packages provide a setup.py that calls the setup() function from either distutils or setuptools.
trans-unit.target: Distutils是Python标准库中的模块，可为开发人员提供基本的软件包管理API。Setuptools是在标准库之外分发的模块，用于扩展distutils。按照惯例，Python软件包提供了 setup.py ，该setup.py从distutils或setuptools 调用 setup() 函数。

trans-unit.source: Do brew info python or brew info python@2 for precise information about the paths. Note, a brewed Python still searches for modules in /Library/Python/X.Y/site-packages and also in ~/Library/Python/X.Y/lib/python/site-packages.
trans-unit.target: 做 brew info python 或 brew info python@2 以获得有关路径的精确信息。请注意，经过冲煮的Python仍会在 /Library/Python/X.Y/site-packages 和 ~/Library/Python/X.Y/lib/python/site-packages 。

trans-unit.source: Firstly, the overall environment in which Homebrew runs is filtered to avoid environment contamination breaking from-source builds (https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/932). In particular, this process filters all but the given whitelisted variables, but allows environment variables prefixed with HOMEBREW_. The specific implementation can be seen in bin/brew.
trans-unit.target: 首先，对运行Homebrew的整个环境进行过滤，以避免环境污染破坏源代码的构建（https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/932）。特别是，此过程将过滤除给定白名单变量之外的所有变量，但允许以 HOMEBREW_ 开头的环境变量。具体的实现可以在 bin/brew 中看到。

trans-unit.source: Follow the Next steps instructions to add Homebrew to your PATH and to your bash shell profile script, either ~/.profile on Debian/Ubuntu or ~/.bash_profile on CentOS/Fedora/RedHat.

trans-unit.source: Formula requiring MPI should use OpenMPI by adding depends_on "open-mpi" to the formula, rather than MPICH. These packages have conflicts and provide the same standardized interfaces. Choosing a default implementation and requiring it to be adopted allows software to link against multiple libraries that rely on MPI without creating un-anticipated incompatibilities due to differing MPI runtimes.
trans-unit.target: 需要MPI的公式应使用OpenMPI，方法是在公式中添加 depends_on "open-mpi" ，而不是MPICH。这些软件包存在冲突，并提供相同的标准化接口。选择默认实现并要求采用默认实现，可使软件链接到依赖MPI的多个库，而不会由于不同的MPI运行时而导致无法预期的不兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Formulae Versions
trans-unit.target: 公式版本

trans-unit.source: Formulae can specify alternate downloads for the upstream project’s head (master/trunk) or devel release (unstable but not master/trunk).
trans-unit.target: 公式可以为上游项目的 head （ master / trunk ）或 devel release（不稳定，但不是 master / trunk ）指定备用下载。

trans-unit.source: Formulae for apps that require Python 3 should declare an unconditional dependency on "python". These apps must work with the current Homebrew Python 3.x formula.
trans-unit.target: 需要Python 3的应用程序的公式应声明对 "python" 的无条件依赖。这些应用程序必须使用当前的Homebrew Python 3.x公式。

trans-unit.source: Formulae in the core repository must have a stable version tagged by the upstream project. Tarballs are preferred to Git checkouts, and tarballs should include the version in the filename whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 核心仓库中的公式必须有上游项目标记的稳定版本。Tarballs比Git签出更受欢迎,tarballs应尽可能在文件名中包含版本。

trans-unit.source: Formulae that declare an unconditional dependency on the "python" or "python@2" formulae are bottled against Homebrew’s Python 3.x or 2.7.x and require it to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 声明对 "python" 或 "python@2" 公式无条件依赖的公式会针对Homebrew的Python 3.x或2.7.x进行瓶装，并要求将其安装。

trans-unit.source: Formulae that depend on versioned formulae must not depend on the same formulae at two different versions twice in their recursive dependencies. For example, if you depend on openssl@1.0 and foo, and foo depends on openssl then you must instead use openssl.
trans-unit.target: 依赖版本化公式的公式的递归依赖性不得两次依赖于两个不同版本的相同公式。例如，如果您依赖 openssl@1.0 和 foo ，而 foo 依赖 openssl ,则必须改为使用 openssl 。

trans-unit.source: GUI apps on macOS don’t have /usr/local/bin in their PATH by default. If you’re on Mountain Lion or later, you can fix this by running sudo launchctl config user path "/usr/local/bin:$PATH" and then rebooting, as documented in man launchctl. Note that this sets the launchctl PATH for all users. For earlier versions of macOS, see this page.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，macOS上的GUI应用程序的 PATH 中没有 /usr/local/bin 。如果您使用的是Mountain Lion或更高版本，则可以通过运行 sudo launchctl config user path "/usr/local/bin:$PATH" 然后重新启动来解决此问题，如 man launchctl 中所述。请注意，这将为所有用户设置launchctl PATH 。对于早期版本的macOS，请参阅此页面。

trans-unit.source: Generally we’d rather you were specific about what files or directories need to be installed rather than installing everything.
trans-unit.target: 通常，我们宁愿您具体确定需要安装哪些文件或目录，而不要安装所有内容。

trans-unit.source: Generate Homebrew’s manpages.
trans-unit.target: 生成Homebrew的联机帮助页。

trans-unit.source: Generate a bottle (binary package) from a formula that was installed with --build-bottle. If the formula specifies a rebuild version, it will be incremented in the generated DSL. Passing --keep-old will attempt to keep it at its original value, while --no-rebuild will remove it.
trans-unit.target: 根据与 --build-bottle 一起安装的公式生成一个瓶子（二进制包）。如果公式指定了重建版本，则它将在生成的DSL中递增。传递 --keep-old 将尝试将其保留为原始值，而 --no-rebuild 会将其移除。

trans-unit.source: Generate a formula for the downloadable file at URL and open it in the editor. Homebrew will attempt to automatically derive the formula name and version, but if it fails, you’ll have to make your own template. The wget formula serves as a simple example. For the complete API, see: http://www.rubydoc.info/github/Homebrew/brew/master/Formula
trans-unit.target: 生成 URL 上可下载文件的公式，然后在编辑器中将其打开。Homebrew将尝试自动导出公式名称和版本，但是如果失败，则必须制作自己的模板。该 wget 的公式作为一个简单的例子。有关完整的API，请参见：http : //www.rubydoc.info/github/Homebrew/brew/master/Formula

trans-unit.source: Generate the template files for a new tap.
trans-unit.target: 为一个新的水龙头生成模板文件。

trans-unit.source: Get a patch from a GitHub commit or pull request and apply it to Homebrew. Optionally, publish updated bottles for the formulae changed by the patch.
trans-unit.target: 从 GitHub 的提交或拉取请求中获取一个补丁,并将其应用到 Homebrew 中。可以选择发布更新后的瓶子,以适应补丁所改变的公式。

trans-unit.source: GitHub Flavoured Markdown. GitHub’s implementation is the standard, period.
trans-unit.target: GitHub风味Markdown。GitHub的实现是标准时期。

trans-unit.source: Give your issue a descriptive title which includes the formula name (if applicable) and the version of macOS or Linux you are using. For example, if a formula fails to build, title your issue “<formula> failed to build on <10.x>”, where “<formula>” is the name of the formula that failed to build, and “<10.x>” is the version of macOS or Linux you are using.
trans-unit.target: 给您的问题提供描述性标题，其中包括公式名称（如果适用）以及您使用的macOS或Linux的版本。例如，如果公式生成失败，则将您的问题命名为“ <formula>在<10.x>上构建失败”，其中“ <formula>”是构建失败的公式的名称，而“ <10。 x>”是您使用的macOS或Linux的版本。

trans-unit.source: Giving style and usage feedback on a PR or commit that involves documents is okay and encouraged. But keep in mind that these are just guidelines, and for any change, the author may have made a deliberate choice to break these rules in the interest of understandability or aesthetics.
trans-unit.target: 对涉及文档的PR或提交给出风格和使用反馈是可以的,也是值得鼓励的。但请记住,这些只是指导原则,对于任何改变,作者可能会为了可理解性或美学而故意选择打破这些规则。

trans-unit.source: Go to the relevant repository (e.g. https://github.com/Homebrew/brew, https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core, etc.) and create a pull request to request review and merging of the commits in your pushed branch. Explain why the change is needed and, if fixing a bug, how to reproduce the bug. Make sure you have done each step in the checklist that appears in your new PR.
trans-unit.target: 转到相关的库（如https://github.com/Homebrew/brew，https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core等），并创建一个拉请求，要求审查，并在提交的合并您推送的分支。说明为什么需要进行更改，如果要修复错误，则说明如何重现该错误。确保已完成新PR中显示的清单中的每个步骤。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew can run on 32-bit ARM (Raspberry Pi and others) and 64-bit ARM (AArch64), but no binary packages (bottles) are available. Support for ARM is on a best-effort basis. Pull requests are welcome to improve the experience on ARM platforms.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew可以在32位ARM(Raspberry Pi和其他)和64位ARM(AArch64)上运行,但没有二进制包(瓶)。对ARM的支持是基于尽力而为的。欢迎提出Pull请求,以改善ARM平台上的体验。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew comes with completion definitions for the brew command. Some packages also provide completion definitions for their own programs.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew附带了 brew 命令的完成定义。一些软件包还为自己的程序提供完成定义。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew depends on having an up-to-date version of Xcode because it comes with specific versions of build tools, e.g. clang.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew依赖于Xcode的最新版本，因为它带有特定版本的构建工具，例如 clang 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew does not currently support 32-bit x86 platforms. It would be possible for Homebrew to work on 32-bit x86 platforms with some effort. An interested and dedicated person could maintain a fork of Homebrew to develop support for 32-bit x86.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew目前不支持32位x86平台。经过一些努力,Homebrew有可能在32位x86平台上运行。有兴趣的人和有心人可以维护Homebrew的分叉,开发对32位x86的支持。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew doesn’t package already-packaged language-specific libraries. These should be installed directly from gem/cpan/pip etc.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew不会打包已经打包的特定语言的库。这些应该直接从 gem / cpan / pip 等安装。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew draws a distinction between Python applications and Python libraries. The difference is that users generally do not care that applications are written in Python; it is unusual that a user would expect to be able to import foo after installing an application. Examples of applications are ansible and jrnl.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew在Python 应用程序和Python 库之间进行了区分。不同之处在于用户通常不关心应用程序是用Python编写的；用户期望在安装应用程序后能够 import foo 是不寻常的。应用的实例是 ansible 和 jrnl 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew expects to find manual pages in #{prefix}/share/man/..., and not in #{prefix}/man/....
trans-unit.target: Homebrew希望在 #{prefix}/share/man/... 中找到手册页，而不在 #{prefix}/man/... 中找到手册页。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has begun gathering anonymous aggregate user behaviour analytics and reporting these to Google Analytics. You will be notified the first time you run brew update or install Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew已开始收集匿名聚合用户行为分析并将其报告给Google Analytics（分析）。首次运行 brew update 或安装Homebrew 时将通知您。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has multiple levels of environment variable filtering which affects variables available to formulae.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew有多个级别的环境变量过滤,会影响公式可用的变量。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has since stopped supporting SHA1 and MD5 entirely. MD5 checksums were removed from core formulae in 2012 and as of April 2015 installing a formula verified by MD5 is actively blocked.
trans-unit.target: 此后，Homebrew不再完全支持SHA1和MD5。2012年从核心公式中删除了MD5校验和，并且自2015年4月起，积极禁止安装由MD5验证的公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew installs to the Cellar and then symlinks some of the installation into /usr/local so that other programs can see what’s going on. We suggest you brew ls a few of the kegs in your Cellar to see how it is all arranged.
trans-unit.target: 将Homebrew安装到 Cellar ，然后将一些安装符号链接到 /usr/local ,以便其他程序可以看到发生了什么。我们建议您 brew ls 几个小桶在你的酒窖，看看它是如何全部安排。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is a poor name, it’s too generic, why was it chosen?
trans-unit.target: 自制是一个不好的名字，它太通用了，为什么选择它？

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is happy to accept applications that are built in Python, whether the apps are available from PyPI or not. Homebrew generally won’t accept libraries that can be installed correctly with pip install foo. Bindings may be installed for packages that provide them, especially if equivalent functionality isn’t available through pip.
trans-unit.target: 无论是否可以从PyPI获得，Homebrew都很乐意接受使用Python构建的应用程序。Homebrew通常不会接受可以通过 pip install foo 正确安装的库。可以为提供绑定的软件包安装绑定，尤其是在pip无法提供等效功能的情况下。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is installed to a prefix other than the standard /usr/local (although some bottles support this).
trans-unit.target: 将Homebrew安装到标准 /usr/local 以外的前缀（尽管有些瓶子支持此功能）。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is provided free of charge and run entirely by volunteers in their spare time. As a result, we do not have the resources to do detailed user studies of Homebrew users to decide on how best to design future features and prioritise current work. Anonymous aggregate user analytics allow us to prioritise fixes and features based on how, where and when people use Homebrew. For example:
trans-unit.target: Homebrew是免费提供的,完全由志愿者在业余时间运营。因此,我们没有资源对Homebrew用户进行详细的用户研究,以决定如何最好地设计未来的功能和优先处理当前的工作。匿名的综合用户分析让我们能够根据用户使用Homebrew的方式、地点和时间来确定修复和功能的优先级。比如说
